title: Elderly Physical-Cognitive Integrated Exercise Gamification Design and Application

context.prior_knowledge: Basic design of senior exercise programs, understanding of gamification elements, and experience with mobile learning tools
context.additional_context: A course where language professionals learn to design gamified exercise programs for the elderly, focusing on developing microlearning content feasible in smartphone-centric, limited-technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can design a body-cognition integrated exercise gamification program for the elderly using the ADDIE model
Learners can develop three or more low-intensity exercise-cognition task combination games executable in mobile environments
Learners can write a usability evaluation report for a gamification program using the SUS scale

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
